summary: This bill, the Weatherization Assistance Program Improvements Act of 2025, amends the Energy Conservation and Production Act to enhance the Weatherization Assistance Program.  It establishes a Weatherization Readiness Fund to assist states in repairing dwelling units to enable weatherization measures, authorizes appropriations for this fund, and increases the maximum financial assistance per dwelling unit.  It also includes conforming amendments and grants the Secretary the ability to adjust funding limits based on market conditions to achieve program goals.
